refnamediv.refpurpose: Functions for shape engines to manipulate Xft fonts

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: PANGO_RENDER_TYPE_XFT
refsect2.para: A string constant that was used to identify shape engines that work with the Xft backend. See PANGO_RENDER_TYPE_FC for the replacement.

refsect2.title: pango_xft_get_context ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves a PangoContext appropriate for rendering with Xft fonts on the given screen of the given display.

listitem.simpara: an X display.
an X screen.
the new PangoContext.

refsect2.title: pango_xft_get_font_map ()
refsect2.para: Returns the PangoXftFontmap for the given display and screen. The fontmap is owned by Pango and will be valid until the display is closed.

listitem.simpara: an X display
the screen number of a screen within display
a PangoFontMap object, owned by Pango.

refsect2.para: Since 1.2

refsect2.title: pango_xft_set_default_substitute ()
refsect2.programlisting: void pango_xft_set_default_substitute (Display *display, int screen, PangoXftSubstituteFunc func, gpointer data, GDestroyNotify notify);
refsect2.para: Sets a function that will be called to do final configuration substitution on a FcPattern before it is used to load the font. This function can be used to do things like set hinting and antialiasing options.

listitem.simpara: an X Display
the screen number of a screen within display
function to call to to do final config tweaking on FcPattern objects.
data to pass to func
function to call when data is no longer used.

refsect2.para: Since 1.2

refsect2.title: PangoXftSubstituteFunc ()
refsect2.para: Function type for doing final config tweaking on prepared FcPatterns.

listitem.simpara: the FcPattern to tweak.
user data.

refsect2.title: pango_xft_substitute_changed ()
refsect2.para: Call this function any time the results of the default substitution function set with pango_xft_set_default_substitute() change. That is, if your subsitution function will return different results for the same input pattern, you must call this function.

listitem.simpara: an X Display
the screen number of a screen within display

refsect2.para: Since 1.2

refsect2.title: pango_xft_shutdown_display ()
refsect2.para: Release any resources that have been cached for the combination of display and screen.

listitem.simpara: an X display
the screen number of a screen within display

refsect2.para: Since 1.2

refsect2.title: pango_xft_render ()
refsect2.programlisting: void pango_xft_render (XftDraw *draw, XftColor *color, PangoFont *font, PangoGlyphString *glyphs, gint x, gint y);
refsect2.para: Renders a PangoGlyphString onto an XftDraw object wrapping an X drawable.

listitem.simpara: the XftDraw object.
the color in which to draw the string
the font in which to draw the string
the glyph string to draw
the x position of start of string (in pixels)
the y position of baseline (in pixels)

refsect2.title: pango_xft_picture_render ()
refsect2.programlisting: void pango_xft_picture_render (Display *display, Picture src_picture, Picture dest_picture, PangoFont *font, PangoGlyphString *glyphs, gint x, gint y);
refsect2.para: Renders a PangoGlyphString onto an Xrender Picture object.

listitem.simpara: an X display
the source picture to draw the string with
the destination picture to draw the strign onto
the font in which to draw the string
the glyph string to draw
the x position of start of string (in pixels)
the y position of baseline (in pixels)

refsect2.title: pango_xft_font_get_font ()
refsect2.para: Returns the XftFont of a font.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFont.
the XftFont associated to font.

refsect2.title: pango_xft_font_get_display ()
refsect2.para: Returns the X display of the XftFont of a font.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFont.
the X display of the XftFont associated to font.

refsect2.title: pango_xft_font_has_char ()
refsect2.para: Determines whether font has a glyph for the codepoint wc.
Use pango_fc_font_has_char() instead.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFont for the Xft backend
Unicode codepoint to look up
TRUE if font has the requested codepoint.

refsect2.para: Since 1.2

refsect2.title: pango_xft_font_lock_face ()
refsect2.para: Gets the FreeType FT_Face associated with a font, This face will be kept around until you call pango_xft_font_unlock_face().
Use pango_fc_font_lock_face() instead.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFont.
the FreeType FT_Face associated with font.

refsect2.para: Since 1.2

refsect2.title: pango_xft_font_unlock_face ()
refsect2.para: Releases a font previously obtained with pango_xft_font_lock_face().
Use pango_fc_font_unlock_face() instead.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFont.

refsect2.para: Since 1.2

refsect2.title: pango_xft_font_get_glyph ()
refsect2.para: Gets the glyph index for a given unicode codepoint for font. If you only want to determine whether the font has the glyph, use pango_xft_font_has_char().
Use pango_fc_font_get_glyph() instead.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFont for the Xft backend
Unicode codepoint to look up
the glyph index, or 0, if the unicode codepoint doesn't exist in the font.

refsect2.para: Since 1.2

refsect2.title: pango_xft_font_get_unknown_glyph ()
refsect2.para: Returns the index of a glyph suitable for drawing wc as an unknown character.
Use pango_fc_font_get_unknown_glyph() instead.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFont.
the Unicode character for which a glyph is needed.
a glyph index into font.
